outline:
1. higher part, upper part
    1. above
    2. on the top of, above, on higher ground than
    3. upwards, higher, above
kjv_def: above, exceeding(-ly), forward, on ([idiom] very) high, over, up(-on, -ward), very.
strongs_def: properly, the upper part, used only adverbially with prefix upward, above, overhead, from the top, etc.
